评论概述: Super cute belt that fits my 32.5" Waist
评论详情: This is a super cute belt and fits my 32.5" Waist perfectly, but the reason I rate it 4 out of 5 stars is because the elastic is very thin, and easily folds over because of this. I can also see it depleting a lot faster than other belts because of the thin elastic. Overall though it is a super cute belt.
Will fit any size! Easy to tie up, looks like good quality, good price point, and works with any outfit!

Belt is comfortable and good quality material. The hardware is solid and has some weight to it, and the leather is stiff and nice. The downside is primarily that the belt smells a bit plasticy/leathery, and the belt is limited in sizing. I've tried to show the size of the belt stretched and unstretched- I wouldn't reccomend if your waist is larger than ~32 inches, though you could always unlace the sides further.

Snaps in the back, very stretchy, easily adjustable in the front, and VERY stylish. Super sturdy and worth the money. I got this belt for my daughter and she is obsessed… and so am I. She looks amazing in it!

评论概述: Cute and nice! Doesn't fit plus size well.
评论详情: I love it and it's cute! But it doesn't fit very well on a plus size body type

I love love love this, it looked super B A and it was super comfortable with full mobility. It really made my costume look amazing and I can’t wait to try it with other outfits!! 💕 I may get another one so that if I can’t find it again I have a backup 🤣
I bought this piece to create a goth+fantasy look for the Ren Faire. Awesome little addition, fits great, quality checks out for the price.
